name: Head nodding yes
details: Don't flip the head back, just lift the eyes to the ceiling.

name: Head half circle rotation
details: Avoid to squeeze the back of the neck.

name: Arms open and close alternatively
details: Keep abs in tight,hips fixed and knees slightly bent.

name: Arms big full circles one arm forward the other backward
Arms big full circles one arm forward the other backward. Switch side
Leg circle through the hip
details: Try to get a good range of motion.

name: Leg circle through the hip. Switch side
details: Try to get a good range of motion.

name: Heel dig
details: Heel down toe up alternating legs.

name: Spine flexion and extension
details: Knees slightly bent. Breath lengthening the spine and exhale blowing all out engage the abs and curl the spine, the head comes down.

name: Spine flexion and extension with arms swing
details: Knees slightly bent. Breath lengthening the spine and exhale blowing all out. Engage the abs and curl the spine, the head comes down.

name: Neck and shoulder stretch
details: Build the stretch first in the neck then press the hand towards the floor. Breath relaxed.

name: Neck and shoulder stretch. Switch side
details: Build the stretch first in the neck then press the hand towards the floor. Breath relaxed.
